definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation
one step further/to move forward a step/further onwards
to impel/to carry forward/to push on/to advance/to drive forward
to try harder/to redouble one's efforts
as quickly as possible/as soon as possible/with all speed
important point/main point/focus/key (project etc)/to focus on/to put the emphasis on
to recount (e.g. results of election)/to re-evaluate
(of systems, facilities etc) comprehensive/well-developed/excellent/to refine/to improve
to intensify/to speed up/to step up
